transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Helllo?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir, Bhumika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART feedback department se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, kaisi chal rahi hai sir services aapki IndiaMART ki?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes sir, are you comfortable in English or Hindi?
Customer: Hindi Hindi.
Executive: Hindi sir, IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Sir, we are trying to matlab sir hum kaafi time se aapse connect karne ki koshish kar rahe the, sir 5 minute ka time nahi hoga bas feedback lena hai aapka.
Customer: Haan, feedback utna acha nahi hai, wo mere ko lead nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Aapko lead nahi aa rahi? Acha.
Customer: Matlab sir jis product mein Kerala ka mera related wala lead nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Acha Kerala mein aap out of out of five one.
Customer: One right.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ek lead aapko mili thi abhi tak? Main complaint kar diya, aapka mail id bhej do main complaint karne ka mail id mein ek official mail dalega.
Executive: Sir official mail dalenge kyu matlab?
Customer: Matlab ye complaint ke liye main many many many time mein aapko jaise aisa aisa aisa aadmi ek main call kar diya main isliye many time bol diya aapko ye official karne ke liye kuch mail id ek to de do abhi main ek mail bhejega mera complaint pura bata ke.
Executive: Acha matlab aapko ye complaint hai ki aapko jo hai lead proper nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Kerala ka lead nahi aa raha hai, pura Uttar Pradesh, Odisha wo ye sab udhar humne kaam nahi karna hai na.
Executive: Main to ek minute sir main aapki catalog abhi open kare hui hu, mujhe to Kerala se kaafi lead dikh rahi hai wo bhi GST verified.
Customer: Full aapni aise bol rahe hai aapka kaam karega aisa bolega aisa hi bolega kuch nahi fayda nahi hai, aap ek kaam karo mail mail mail id bhej do.
Executive: Haan bolo bolo mail id mein note karega.
Executive: Mail bheju main aapko iske liye?
Customer: Haan main
Executive: Ji mail id bol do.
Customer: Aapko complaint karne ka.
Executive: Complaint karni hai aapko? Haan complaint.
Executive: Sir main ek baar aisa karti hu, main ek baar main ek baar aisa karti hu sir ki jo manager hai unse main connect karwati hu aapka.
Customer: Theek hai, nahi nahi chahiye mere ko mail id hai main many time main bol diya.
Executive: Sir aap mail bhi karoge to unhi ke paas jayega na.
Customer: Haan usko usko jana chahiye baad mein call karega.
Executive: Wahi time mein ye baat karne ka koi record nahi hai na, mail jayega to uska record aayega.
Executive: Sir jo hum aapse baat karte hai ye bhi recorded line pe baat hoti hai.
Customer: Wo aapke liye recorded hai mere ke liye record nahi hai, mere ke liye koi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir company mein record ho rahi hai aapki jo bhi hum baat kar rahe hai.
Customer: Wo aapke liye record hai mere ko kya kaise malum hai record hai nahi nahi nahi malum hai.
Executive: Kaise baat kar rahe hai aap?
Executive: Aapse hum jo baat kar rahe hai ye recorded mera mera baat sun sunta hai to main ek request kar diya na uske liye ek jagah de do mail id de do.
Executive: Okay mail id.
Customer: Haan mail id.
Executive: Sir aapke account manager ki mail id hai amrit.pande@indiamart.com.
Customer: Uska nahi chahiye uska nahi wo complaint dalne ke liye mail id kaunsa hai?
Executive: Complaint dalne ke liye mail id? Ye amrit pande ka upar ka complaint nahi hai ye lead nahi aa rahe iske liye complaint hai wo uska complaint nahi hai.
Executive: Sir main aapse tabhi to keh rahi hu sir aap jo mail dalenge ye amrit pande ji aapse connect karenge isiliye main aapse keh rahi hu ki jo unke bhi manager hai main unse aapko connect karwati hu directly.
Customer: Manager ka nahi hai customer care ka number de do mail id de do.
Executive: Nahi to main app se dekhega okay.
Customer: App mein aayega na?
Executive: Sir main ek baar aapko manager se connect karwati hu aap.
Customer: Customer care ka mail id puch raha main usme wo app se leke dalega dekhega usme.
Executive: Sir lekin aapko agar kuch services mein problem hai to aapse connect to wahi karenge na manager.
Customer: Wo uska time jyada time ho gaya wo daily aapko jaise dusra aadmi call kar rahe hai dusra dusra dusra aise kar rahe hai koi fayda nahi.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Sir jo manager jo higher level pe hai na unse aapki baat karwaungi.
Customer: Main unko aapka feedback deti hu ki aapko ye problem hai.
Executive: Pehle main ek mail dalega baad mein automatic call aayega.
Customer: Wo time mein clear karega pehle mail dalega.
Executive: Mujhe free time bataiye.
Executive: Okay jisme aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads, especially from Kerala.

- Wants an email ID to register a complaint.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect with manager.

- Executive provided account manager's email ID.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will check for customer care email in app.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, complaint, email id, customer care
